**Better readability** 
 We have made our brand color a little darker to increase the color contrast and thereby improve readability. 
 
 **Optimized input field** 
 The cursor in the input field for the access number has been removed.

The ordering process is now easier and faster.

Our app is now also available in Spanish and Irish.

We have introduced new contact options for selected insurance companies. 
 
ğŸ” **Detailed access logs** 
We now also display the telematics IDs in the access logs, making it easier to identify who had access.

**ğŸ“² Redeem prescribed DiGAs** 
You can now redeem prescriptions for digital health applications (DiGAs) directly via the e-prescription app. The prescriptions will be issued by specialists in Hamburg as part of a pilot project. You can find your activation code and the link to the DiGA right here in the e-prescription app. 
 
 **ğŸ¥ New pharmacy database** 
We have introduced a new, future-proof database for pharmacy searches.

**â™¿ï¸ Accessibility** 
Our accessibility statement is now available in the settings. The onboarding process has also been made more accessible. 
 
 **ğŸ“² Redeem DiGAs with insurance companies** 
 Prescriptions for digital health applications (DiGAs) can now also be redeemed with other insurance companies.

**ğŸ™Œ Registration for privately insured people** 
Registration for privately insured people has been optimized. You can log in conveniently with your health ID in just a few clicks. 
 
 **ğŸ¥ Updated pharmacy data** 
Changes that pharmacies make in the new database are now reliably displayed. 
 
 **ğŸ“² More information for DiGAs** 
From now on you will receive more detailed information about your DiGA prescriptions, such as the sales price or the logo.

The screen for entering the health card access number has been redesigned and is now optimized for use with VoiceOver.
